data.persona: I am an inhabitant of the village. I have seen the king with my eyes. I am a father of many daughters.
data.description:
You are in the Lord's Castle.
This is the location in the netherworld where the Lord and controller lives.  It is in the center of the netherworld and is difficult to reach as it is built on high rocky cliffs.
There's a sorcerer's orb and a rocky cliffs here.
The troll and the lord and controller are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to obtain the orb to stay safe.
data.mid_motivation: I need to protect myself and my daughters from the Lord and controller.
data.long_motivation: I need to move my family away from the village, the Lord, and the netherworld.
